bibl.title: Isis in Roman Dakhleh: Goddess of the Village, the Province, and the Country.
Isis on the Nile. Egyptian Gods in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt. Proceedings of the IVth International Conference of Isis Studies, Li√®ge, November 27-29, 2008. Michel Malaise in honorem
bibl.author: KAPER, Olaf E.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Isis in the Mortuary Beliefs of Dakhleh. - Isis in the Temple Decoration of the Oasis. - The Gegengabe of Isis. - Evidence for the Cultic Veneration of Isis in the Temple Decoration. - Evidence for the Cultic Veneration of Isis in Sources other than the Temple Decoration. - Evidence for Veneration of Isis from Domestic Contexts. - Conclusions.
